title: Memorial Day deals at Amazon: Echo Dot, Fire TV Stick, Ring and more on sale
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: The best device deals from Amazon's Memorial Day sale
article: We're rounding up today's top deals from the Amazon Memorial Day sale which includes impressive price cuts on its best-selling devices like the latest Echo Dot, the Fire TV Stick Lite, the Echo Show smart display, Ring security cameras, and more.

Our favorite deals from the Amazon Memorial Day sale include a 30% discount on the 4th generation Echo Dot, the budget Fire TV Stick Lite on sale for just $24.99 and the Echo Show 5 on sale for a record-low price of $49.99 (was $89.99). If you're interested in home security bargains, you can find Memorial Day deals on Ring devices like the best-selling Ring Video doorbell marked down to $89.99 and up to $130 in savings on the Ring alarm smart home kit. See more of the best deals from Amazon's Memorial Day sale below and keep in mind, this is probably the last time you'll find discounts on these devices before the upcoming Prime Day event.
